questions.question_text: When unsealing Vault each Shamir unseal key should be entered:

choices.D: At the command line in one single command
choices.C: While encrypted with each administrators PGP key
choices.B: By different administrators each connecting from different computers
choices.A: Sequentially from one system that all of the administrators are in front of

questions.question_text: As a best practice, the root token should be stored in which of the following ways?

choices.B: Should be stored in configuration automation tooling
choices.A: Should be revoked and never stored after initial setup
choices.C: Should be stored in another password safe

questions.question_text:
HOTSPOT -
Where do you define the Namespace to log into using the Vault UI?

To answer this question -
Use your mouse to click on the screenshot in the location described above. An arrow indicator will mark where you have clicked. Click the "Answer” button once you have positioned the arrow to answer the question. You may need to scroll down to see the entire screenshot.
//IMG//

choices.B: You cannot have a wildcard (“*”) in the path
choices.A: Replace write with create in the capabilities list

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
Write is not a valid capability https://developer.hashicorp.com/vault/docs/concepts/policies#policy-syntax

questions.question_text: Where can you set the Vault seal configuration? (Choose two.)
